meaning: discard, throw away, abandon, resign, reject, sacrifice

onyomiExamples.meaning: adoption or rejection, selection, choice, option
adoption or rejection, choice, separating the needed from the unneeded

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to throw away, to cast away, to dump, to discard, to abandon, to desert, to leave, to give up, to resign

kunyomiExamples.example: 捨てる神あれば拾う神あり
kunyomiExamples.reading: すてるかみあればひろうかみあり
kunyomiExamples.meaning: when one door is shut, another is open, the world is as kind as it is cruel
